attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Means Testing is on the whole a completely outdated method of judging whether someone is entitled to benefits.There are many instances of the process driving people into poverty and in some cases a downward spirral to suicide.It effects us all,rich or poor.Some councils such as Glasgow  Council Finance Department are totally heavy handed in their approach to handling cases regarding council tax rebate and rent benefit.
